dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 1721 IH: To reauthorize appropriations for the National Women’s Rights History Project Act.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Slaughter (for herself, Mr. Hanna, Mr. Tonko, Mr. Katko, and Mr. Reed) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To reauthorize appropriations for the National Women’s Rights History Project Act.

subsection.text: Section 1602 of Title XVI of Public Law 96–607 (16 U.S.C. 410ll–1) is amended in subsection (f)(2) by striking 2013 and inserting 2019.

subsection.header: National Women’s Rights History Project Registry and the National Women’s Rights History Project Partnership Network
subsection.text: Section 7111 of the Omnibus Public Land Management Act of 2009 (Public Law 111–11) is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (b)(5) by striking 2013 and inserting 2019; and
in subsection (c)(4) by striking 2013 and inserting 2019.
